section.p: It begins to drizzle with rain. Strolling along, you see seven worried shepherds wading about in the middle of a stream waving their crooks in the air. Their dogs are watching in amazement from the banks. ‘Whatever are you doing?’ you ask.
‘We’ve decided to herd fish instead of sheep, because you can’t sell mutton on Friday,’ replies one.
‘But now it’s raining, we’re trying to round the fish up so they don’t get wet,’ puts in another.
Shaking your head, you set off down the road. .
